decisions.rationale: User said 'for now, let's keep it all uber'

decisions.decision: Build V3 based on analyst research framework
decisions.rationale: V2 has 3 critical failures (future predictions) and missing 10 critical questions from analyst research

approaches.approach: Audit V2 questions against analyst framework first, then build V3
approaches.rationale: Faster than building from scratch - keep 23 good questions, fix 3 failures, add 10 missing

assumptions.assumption: Questions that move valuation >$3/share are the ones that matter most
assumptions.needsTest: Run sensitivity analysis on answers to prove impact

assumptions.assumption: Organic vs promotional growth is critical missing question
assumptions.needsTest: Test if this actually changes fair value significantly

assumptions.assumption: Uber One subscription metrics are critical
assumptions.needsTest: Model impact on recurring revenue quality

signals.signal: User provided comprehensive analyst research document (30 questions from real analyst methodology)
signals.impact: Validates our approach - these are the questions top analysts actually ask
